comments:
Created an attachment (id=78543)
the bugged project a produced as sample

Build ID: I20070621-1340

Steps To Reproduce:
It is not easily reproduce the error so I prepared a bugged sample project:

1. Download a bugged eclipse project from http://www.ood.it/eventloader.tar.gz or use the attached file

2. decompress it in a temporary directory 
tar xzvf eventloader.tar.gz /tmp/ 

3. Create a new Java Project from directory /tmp/eventloader and click finish

4. Enter the package it/telecomitalia/loader/alicelive

4. Compare each other these files:

BasketLoader.java
CalcioLoader.java

5. Click on the first difference the compare editor show an try to "Copy the current change from Right to Left"

You'll receive the following error:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2007-09-17 13:42:50.969
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Update comparison Compare (BasketLoader.java-CalcioLoader.java)".
!STACK 0

Vincenzo, I believe this issue has been addressed in the 3.3.1 stream. Would you mind grabbing the latest 3.3.1 build and checking for us?
